tasks.instruction: Prepare a deployment strategy for the Raja Repair Cirebon application using the domain rajarepaircirebon.com hosted at rumahweb.com. Focus on a cloud hosting solution that doesn't require a VPS, is cost-effective, and can handle multiple users.

Guide the user through deploying their Raja Repair Cirebon application to Netlify using GitHub integration and connecting their domain 'rajarepaircirebon.com' from rumahweb.com. Provide step-by-step instructions with screenshots where possible.

Provide detailed step-by-step instructions for uploading the Raja Repair Cirebon application files from the local workspace to the existing GitHub repository (maspen10/raja-repair-cirebon). Include instructions for using Git commands from the command line with the specific local workspace path (/workspace/shadcn-ui/) and the correct repository URL (https://github.com/maspen10/raja-repair-cirebon.git).
